remarks: Membership in the range of a restricted operation class abstraction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-May-2019.)
statement:
rngop.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
elrnmpt2res $p |- ( D e. V -> ( D e. ran ( F |` R ) <-> E. x e. A E. y e. B ( D = C /\ x R y ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d D x y $.
$d R x y $.
